body:
Postdoctoral researcher in Computer Science at [Inria, Rennes, France](http://www.inria.fr/centre/rennes) [read more...]

Please do not hesitate to contact me for:

* Teaching and training in any of my research areas,
* Establishing collaborative work,
* Solving interesting software engineering problems.

E-mails: mauricio.alferez at inria.fr, alferez.mauricio at gmail.com

# Research Interests

I am interested in the area of Computer Science Engineering with a focus on Informatics and Software Systems.  The topics that keep most of my attention and current research effort are:

* Low-Carbon Energy-Aware Systems
* Model-Driven Software Development
* Software Verification
* Software Product Lines
* Domain-Specific Languages Engineering
* Aspect-Oriented Software Development
* Requirements Engineering
* Applied formal Methods
